resources.string: 30 Days Of Wellness
spend some time to learn data structures and algorithms
will try to do few problems related to trees and recursion
Study a new algorithm and understand its implementation.
Choose a complex algorithm like Dijkstra algorithm or the A* search algorithm. Read relevant sections from online resources, understand its theory, and implement it in code.
Day %s
Prepare for an upcoming quiz of enterprise computing .
Review lecture notes, textbooks, and any supplementary materials to ensure i understand key concepts.
Design a Database Schema
Design a database schema for a given application scenario. Normalize the schema to reduce redundancy and ensure data integrity.
Spend 15 minutes outdoors
Go for a walk and do exercise
Healthy Eating Plan
Create a meal plan for the week focusing on nutritious and balanced meals. Include plenty of fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, and whole grains.
play cricket with friends
go outside with friends and play cricket
go to calgary library
spend some time exploring books
Build a Portfolio Website
Create a personal portfolio website showcasing your projects, skills, and experience. Use HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for front-end development.
Develop a Blogging Platform
Build a blogging platform where users can create, edit, and publish blog posts. Implement user authentication and authorization using technologies like Express.js and MongoDB.
Build a 2D Platformer Game:
Create a 2D platformer game using unreal. Implement player movement, level design, and basic physics interactions.
Develop a Puzzle Game
Design and develop a puzzle game with unique mechanics and challenging levels. Use Unity or Unreal Engine features to create engaging gameplay.
Design a Tower Defense Game
Build a tower defense game where players strategically place defensive towers to stop waves of enemies. Implement game mechanics like tower upgrades and enemy spawning.
Optimize Algorithms
Analyze and optimize the time and space complexity of algorithms. Practice techniques like memoization, dynamic programming, and divide-and-conquer to improve algorithm efficiency.
Study System Design
Learn about system design principles and design scalable and efficient systems. Practice designing systems like a URL shortener, social media platform, or ride-sharing service.
Gratitude Practice

Cultivate a sense of gratitude by writing down three things you are grateful for each day. Focus on the positive aspects of your life, no matter how small, and notice how this practice shifts your mindset.
Mindfulness Meditation
Dedicate time to mindfulness meditation to cultivate present moment awareness and reduce stress.
Vocabulary Expansion
Improve your vocabulary by learning new words.Look up their definitions and try to use them in sentences of your own.
Creative Writing Prompts
Challenge to write a short story, poem, or personal essay based on daily writing prompts.
Expense Tracking
Track your spending habits for a week to identify areas where you can cut back or reallocate funds.
Plan a Movie Night
Coordinate with friends to schedule a movie night. Choose a date, time, and location for the movie screening.
Tournament Planning
Organize a game tournament with your friends. Choose a competitive game that everyone enjoys and establish rules for the tournament format.
Group Study Sessions
Organize study groups with classmates or friends to collaborate on assignments, review material, and discuss challenging topics.
Online Course
Enroll in an online course related to your professional or personal interests. Spend time each day completing lessons and assignments to expand your knowledge and skills.
Reach Out to Loved Ones
Connect with friends or family members you haven not spoken to in a while.
Acts of Kindness
Perform one act of kindness each day, whether it helping a neighbor, volunteering in your community, or offering support to someone in need.
complete enterprise computing final project
Embark on the culmination of your enterprise computing journey with the completion of the final project.
do assignment 3 of dsa
will focus on doing assignment 3 and read notes from online resources and taken while class.
work on developing pac man game
Embark on developing a Pac-Man game, diving into the realm of retro gaming.
give final touch to capstone project
Finalizing the capstone project involves reviewing and refining all aspects to ensure quality and completeness
